commentBody: First of all sport is about athletes competing among each other according to mutually accepted rules using humanly gifted abilities and developed skills.  The fact that we adore and are in such awe of athletic talent is what creates a 'spectator sport', indeed fuels it.  But athletes and humans participating in sports at any level want and expect fairness and accuracy in all calls without bias, subjectivity or self-interest if possible, whether a fan likes it, doesn't want it, is distracted or turned off by it or not.   The better the technology gets in producing instantaneous accuracy, the better the athletes become and yes, the better the sport gets.
